body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Portable Handheld Garment Fabric Wrinkles Remover with large Tank Capacity for Clothes and Curtains - Spit-Free & Auto Shut Off - White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 16 mins
features: FANCY SHOP GARMENT STEAMER: Make your daily routine easier and more efficient with the Fancy Shop Home 800W Handheld Garment Steamer. Traditional ironing can be a time-consuming chore, but our powerful steamer offers a hassle-free way to eliminate wrinkles and refresh your clothes, curtains, carpets, and more.

EFFORTLESS WRINKLE REMOVAL- Tired of waiting for your iron to heat up or dealing with the bulkiness of ironing boards? Our garment steamer is the solution you need. Thanks to fast heat-up technology, it's ready to use in under a minute, saving you time and effort. The large 150ml water tank capacity ensures you can steam for up to 10 minutes without frequent refills. Say goodbye to fabric wrinkles effortlessly.

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Whether you're on a business trip, a vacation, or just at home, our travel-sized garment steamer is an essential companion. Its lightweight and compact design allows for easy packing in your luggage, ensuring you always look elegant and well-groomed wherever you go.

ANTI-SPIT & AUTO SHUT-OFF: Our garment steamer features a spit-free design, ensuring your clothes stay dry during steaming. Plus, the auto shut-off safety function provides peace of mind, as the steamer will turn off automatically when not in use, preventing overheating.

MULTI-FABRIC APPLICATION: From delicate silk to heavy curtains and even carpets, this steamer handles various fabrics without any issues. It offers a versatile solution for all your steaming needs. Upgrade your garment care routine with the Fancy Shop Home 800W Handheld Garment Steamer. It's a powerful, efficient, and travel-friendly solution for wrinkle-free clothes and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy fill, easy empty Say goodbye to inconvenient messes and spills with our 3.5-inch wide-mouth design. Built for busy people who want quick results, top-up for your travel partner in seconds and be ready to steam in < 2 minutes. Safety first Ever worry about leaving your appliances on? Well, this isn’t one of them. Complete with auto-shutoff, this steamer has an internal timer that protects against overheating after every use. Now that’s what we call peace of mind. Wrinkles don’t stand a chance. Don’t let this steamer’s size fool you. Fortified by a powerful, high-temperature speed flow, this petite-sized steamer can smooth out even the most stubborn of kinks using our sophisticated, controlled steam release system.

The sleek design and easy-to-use controls make it a must-have for anyone seeking efficiency in their ironing routine. Say goodbye to stubborn creases. Even my husband loved it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FABRIC STEAMER!
reviews.reviewText: While this steamer is positioned as a "travel steamer," I wanted one for home use when I just didn't feel like ironing something. It has come is especially handy for some rather expensive suits that got wrinkled and we don't want the "iron sheen" that can be sometimes seen on these types of fabrics. This steamer has a large tank, so don't have to refill as often as one would with a true travel steamer, and it works just great! Recommend.
